headline: Cyber Security Engineer (Team Lead) at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

defaultPosition.description:
- Project manager over 20+ concurrent ICE security engineering projects
- Annual budget ~$2.5 million
- Manage implementation and administration of various security products including Splunk, Tanium, Fortify, Nessus, HP Web Inspect, DB Protect, McAfee Enterprise suite, Encase Enterprise, and various other forensic and penetration testing tools.

positions.description:

â¢	Wrote acquisition documents and defended budgetary requests for new security technologies to management

Penetration Lab Team Member
